docs.title: Wallets
docs.text: The wallets API allows developers and clients to get information about certain wallets, wether they are flagged as malicious or blacklisted somewhere.

docs.title: Status
docs.text:
Checks the status of the given wallet

curl https://api.wavynode.com/v1/wallets/{wallet}/status?apiKey={you-api-key}

Response:

{
    "success": true,
    "data": {
        "status": "dirty",
        "tags": [
            "tornado"
        ],
        "lastTxs": [],
        "lastDapps": []
    }
}
